part_number.selectors: [id*='part-number'], [id*='model-number'], [id*='sku'], [class*='part-number'], [class*='model-number'], [class*='sku'], .part-number, .model-number, .sku, .mpn, [data-test*='sku'], [data-test*='part'], span:has-text('Part #'), span:has-text('SKU'), span:has-text('Item #'), span:has-text('Model'), li:has-text('Part #'), li:has-text('SKU'), li:has-text('Item #'), li:has-text('Model'), tr:has-text('Part Number'), div:has-text('SKU:')
